changeSet.sql: -- Report: Premature Liquidation Transactions for Today SELECT onhold.savings_account_id AS account_id, client.id AS customer_id, client.display_name AS customer_name, onhold.amount AS liquidation_amount, onhold.transaction_date AS liquidation_date FROM m_deposit_account_on_hold_transaction onhold JOIN m_savings_account savings ON onhold.savings_account_id = savings.id JOIN m_client client ON savings.client_id = client.id WHERE onhold.transaction_type_enum = 'PREMATURE_LIQUIDATION' -- Transaction type for premature liquidation AND onhold.transaction_date = CURDATE(); -- Only todayâ€™s transactions
